history.text: So how did you feel about this movie?
This movie is an award winning true story of justice. Dicted by Mr. Hancock, the Blind Side shows great acting in the  Sandra Bullock prime era. The fact that the story is true is even better.
I felt great about it
so how did u feel?
I didn't realize the movie was based on a book. I thought the movie was incredible. The guy who played the football character did a phenomenal job.
Yes, he plays for the Baltimore Ravens and even won a super bowwl I believe
It kind of makes me feel bad too though because I would never take in someone I didn't know into my home like that with my kid. Especially with things how they are - the shootings and all.
Yes, it shows how hard it is to make it in the inner city
I feel like it kind of paints a picture that isn't reality in most cases...it's just hard to know about a person.
It's hard to know how to help when you to...
I know but I guess we all try to do what we can
Yes, but it makes a good point about the talent and potential out there that is limited due to circumstances.
I love movies that highlight the true worth of human beings despite their circumstances
yes
and directed well
sandra bullock did a good acting job to sell it and the buy playing the player
Yes she did phenomenal
do u remember any of her other movies
I really liked her in Speed,.....it's the first movie I saw her in
But I really liked Hope Floats as well
RIght
I wonder why they gave it a 69% rating
rotten tomatoes that is
Have you seen her? Okay I didn't know Tim Mcgraw was in the movie.....isn't he a country singer?
Sometimes I don't agree with their ratings
yes i know
yes sometimes
how u feel about foster care? which is  a heavy topic in this movie

I have mixed feelings. I really want to take in foster children but I'm concerned about the effect on my own child. I have seen families ripped apart by taking in foster children. Two completely divorced, broke apart and the biological children were messed up by it.
Yes I understand. Well in this movie  he was black and had to switch a whole culrtue
u dont have to display yours but how hard is that as a teen??u think?
Yes but I love how it shows that genuine love and compassion can do so much for a person.
Yes really.
What else do you like about the film or always wanted to know?
Oh man, and I love that it is a true story. True stories are the best.
Yes forreal.
I loved the boy that played the son of Sandra Bullock....great personality. Of course you always wonder what the real people are really like.
I love the Memphis area its shot in as well
I agree
Yes I wish the film industry would expand their destinations and explore some of the unique places in the United States instead of always New York, California, Las Vegas, etc.
See I didint know that
Thats interesteing
